name: Tilescapes-Taste of Zen
description:
Now you have found your secret place of zen!

Don’t you feel stressed out in daily life? Here’s a quiet place that you can calm your mind and relax yourself.
Try Tilescapes, it’s a secret zen garden belongs to you!

Decorate and enlighten your zen room by clearing the levels of our one-of- a-kind centering tile matching puzzle game.

Not only can you experience a centering tile match game of zen, but also you can feel a tranquil vibe, which allows you to spread your wings and create a peaceful zen room!

We all enjoy the happy time surrounded by adorable animals, now you can have them by unlocking our special daily puzzles and enjoy their company!

Zen is a form of the Buddhist religion that concentrates on meditation. Over 900 levels help you dive deeply in a mind flow of zen.

Invigorate your soul through our peaceful zen-world. A quiet and restful room you will find through centering tile matching game daily.


Features:
•Complete nearly 1000 matching puzzles that are fun and challenging with relaxed and pleasant music.
•Decorate your own zen room to feel tranquillity.
•Unlock a series of rooms, scenery, and tiles!
•Challenge yourself by playing daily matching puzzles.
•Experience beautiful scenery and open your mind in zen nature.
